sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Hero and Leander: begun by Christopher Marloe; and finished by George Chapman Marlowe, Christopher, 1564-1593. Chapman, George, 1559?-1634. aut
[104] p.
Printed by Felix Kingston, for Paule Linley, and are to be solde in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Blacke-beare, At London : 1598.
Marlowe wrote sestiads 1-2, Chapman 3-6. In verse. Signatures: A-N⁴. The last leaf is blank. Variant: title misprints "Leandr". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
Hero and Leander: begun by Christopher Marloe; and finished by George Chapman Marlowe, Christopher, 1564-1593. Chapman, George, 1559?-1634. aut
[104] p.
Printed by Felix Kingston, for Paule Linley, and are to be solde in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Blacke-beare, At London : 1598.
Marlowe wrote sestiads 1-2, Chapman 3-6. In verse. Signatures: A-N⁴. The last leaf is blank. Variant: title misprints "Leandr". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Paule Linley
Felix Kingston
Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Blacke-beare
>>>>>>> imprintparse
